architectureStyle.description: Elegant but intimidating - classical Roman/Imperial aesthetic with hidden surveillance and secrets
keyElements: Classical columns and grand facades hiding advanced technology
Green marble and polished dark stone
Bird of prey motifs - wings, talons, predatory shapes
Hidden rooms, secret passages, surveillance everywhere
Tal Shiar observation towers disguised as architecture
Byzantine influenced but more angular and threatening
